summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Assign Your Assignment academic marketplace. Backend APIs mostly functional (22/24 tests passed), frontend UI working well, admin panel operational, user flows functional. Payment integration properly mocked.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 500 Internal Server Error due to ObjectId serialization
Returns 500 Internal Server Error due to ObjectId serialization
critical_bugs.impact: Admin cannot create new projects with file upload

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section and trust signals
All 4 pre-loaded subjects display correctly (Economics, Accountancy, BST, Physical Education)
Admin login works with default credentials (admin/admin123)
Admin dashboard shows stats (revenue: â‚¹0, orders: 1, projects: 3, subjects: 4)
Checkout page renders with customer info form
Payment flow initiates (Cashfree mocked as expected)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix ObjectId serialization issues in backend endpoints: 1) Update Subject endpoint returning MongoDB ObjectId instead of clean JSON, 2) Create Project endpoint failing due to same ObjectId serialization issue. Both endpoints need proper ObjectId exclusion in database queries.

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all major UI flows working, minor navigation issues)
success_percentage.integration: 90% (payment mocked as expected, core flows functional)
